page.title: 02BIOGRAPHY
page.content:
Mrs J Bailey has lived in an old peoples Bungalow for two and a half years before that she lived in a larger council house in Brookside. She likes living there very much because there are lots of homes nearby and she is not lonely. She goes to a Friendship Club, Mother's Union and her husband goes to Whist Drives <which is cards> and bingo. When she needs shopping she goes on the bus to Bishop Stortford because she has not got a car. Her hobbies are looking after the other people in the bungalows.She does not have Meals on Wheels because she can cook her own meals.
r
